Let's Revamp The Digital Industry Together

A one stop platform for all your digital needs because Your Growth is Our Responsibility.

GET STARTED

Our Services

Choose your desire servies.

VIEW ALL

Managing Artists and Labels

For our onboard artists and labels we offer a range of services,such as managing your brands.

Music Distribution and Monetization

KMI has immaculate record of distributing audio/video on 100+ platforms across the globe.

Dealing with Royalities and Copyrights

KMI is fully capable of claiming and collecting performance royalties for your music.

Revamping your brand with our Merchandising

KMI helps accentuating your brand image by our quirky and fun merchandising.

Our Mobile VAS

RBT and CRBT As customers adore personalisation KMI has one of the many value-added services.

Artist Verification

Artist verification is the process of verifying the identity of a musician or singer on their official website or social media profiles.

About Us

KMI supported by 55+ labels, 115+ Sub-labels, and 1300 artists, is a very prominent company among the very few royalty-based music aggregation companies of Pakistan.
We at KMI offer a variety of services to labels, brands, artists, and bands which include marketing and distribution, YouTube Monetization, the assistance of content ID, copyright consulting, royalty claims, merchandising, artist's tour and concerts management, and a lot more. Join us to change the way you look at the digital industry.

Experience

We are excellence in developing web solutions for companies.

Affiliation

We seek to build something that changes people's lives.

Our Milestones

Over the years we have done many things that we are proud of. This motivates us to continue looking for new challenges in order to improve our services.

25846

YouTube Channels

Team of Experts​

Our team will help you define a stand-out creative direction and will translate it into visual assets that will resonate with your audience.

Sheikh Kamran

CEO / FOUNDER

Kamran, a skilled music copyright and management professional with five years of experience in the music industry, having worked with industry giants such as The Orchard Music and Believe Music. With a deep understanding of music licensing, publishing, and distribution

Sheikh Ehsan

DIRECTOR/CO-FOUNDER

Ehsan, a seasoned professional with ten years of experience in music, film, drama production, and artist management. With a diverse range of skills and expertise in multiple areas of the entertainment industry, Ehsan is well-equipped to help artists and producers alike bring their creative visions to life.

Albert Robey

YouTube Certified & Copyright Expert

Albert, a seasoned professional with 15 years of experience in youtube music, film, drama, and artist management. With a diverse range of skills and expertise in multiple areas of the music industry, Albert is well-equipped to help artists and producers alike bring their creative visions to life.

Syeda Maryam Ejaz

DIRECTOR/Team Leader

Maryam, a skilled social media and business communication expert with six years of experience in the music industry. Maryam's expertise in digital marketing and strategic communication can help artists and music industry professionals effectively reach and engage with their audience, build their brand, and grow their business.

Let's Talk?

Talk to one of our consultants today and get your music monetized.
